channel.title: Lost-LegacyV2 [PI BASED] [VPS HOSTED]
channel.description:
[center]Hello everyone, my name is Dillon. Owner of Lost-Legacy. I am in need of a few employees.
First off I would like to introduce myself; My name is Dillon Willis, and I have been working with Java, RSPS coding, and all other material involving Runescape. I am currently 17 years old, and this year and next will be the last years of my Runescape career, I will be heading off to college to get a Computer Programming diploma.
I am only looking for a few developers at the moment. I need a good coder, I need a few things changed in the server. I also need a webclient/forums programmer. The server can hold around 600-750 players without anytime type of lagg.
You must have atleast 8+ months of coding to become one of my employees. If you know how to make a webclient then please let me know. [center]Please fill a template out like this one;[/center] [code]Your msn: How long have you been coding?: What you do (coding wise): How much free time do you have to play?: [/code] [/center]
You can also contact me via msn: DillonX10@hotmail.com

item.title: Lost-LegacyV2 [PI BASED] [VPS HOSTED]
item.dc:creator: @outrageouscape outrageouscape
item.description:
@outrageouscape wrote:

Your msn: Rip_eldie@hotmail.com
How long have you been coding?: 3 1/2 years
What you do (coding wise): Anything you need But I do best at Debugging.
How much free time do you have to play?:
~5 hours Monday - Friday
~8 hours Saturday - Sunday. NO LIFE I KNOW -.-
